title: About this site
---

* This site is constructed using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/).

* Learn more about [quarto websites.](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/)

* Learn more about [quarto and gh-pages](https://quarto.org/docs/publishing/github-pages.html)

    * Your website will be constructed in this *./website* folder.  

    * You'll `quarto render` the folder and ALL the QMD files will be converted to HTML files 
    and moved to the *./docs* folder.
